experience.description: Wi-Fi driver and system software development for home gateway. Got familiar with 802.11 standard.

Designed firmware for industrial  IO module (16DI) with DCON/RS485 interface built on AVR MCU.
Designed Linux based firmware for cellular router built on
AT91RM9200 CPU. Firmware includes Linux kernel, kernel modules, configuration scripts for automated creation of pppd session, network tunnels and other services, web-interface. Wrote technical documentation and provided technical support for device users.
Partially and fully designed hardware architecture for new products (Marvell and Mediatek CPUs), chose key components and defined interfaces between them as well as external interfaces.
Verified schematics and PCBs before production. Assembled and debugged sample devices.
Deployed and introduced to workflow Redmine, OTRS, TeamCity.
Took part in developing Python based automated mass production testing and quality assurance system and related hardware. System is able to test, flash and keep information about four product families, ten to twenty variants of hardware in each family.
Supervised mass production (10 000 pcs) in China several times. Deployed and maintained testing hardware and software, verified pre-production samples and parts,
Took part in modifying OpenWRT to fit in house designed  hardware, added software packages and kernel driver patches, modified DTS.
Developed FreeRTOS based firmware for STM32 MCUs.

User management within Windows Domain. Preparing work places (RDP/Citrix), server migration, backups.
Buy, install, service, repair printers and other office equipment. прокладывал ЛВС. Build networks and video surveillance. 
Installed Linux based fax server forwarding received faxes to email and network drive.

higher.name: Санкт-Петербургский государственный электротехнический университет "ЛЭТИ" им. В.И. Ульянова (Ленина), Санкт-Петербург
higher.faculty: Электротехники и автоматики, Электротехнологическая и преобразовательная техника
